com.teleca.RSSTestReader.Activity
Class RSSTestReaderActivity

java.lang.Object
  ListActivity
      com.teleca.RSSTestReader.Activity.RSSTestReaderActivity

public class RSSTestReaderActivity
extends ListActivity

This is a RSS message reader activity. This activity contains a list of rss messages and two menu items:

  1. RSS Edit Url - rss feeds list editor.
  2. Refresh - refresh RSS message list.

Author:
ruinilyu
See Also:
ListActivity

onOptionsItemSelected

public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
Handle item selection. There are two items:
  1. RSS Edit Url - rss feeds list editor.
  2. Refresh - refresh RSS message list.

Parameters:
item - menu item instance (non-Javadoc)
Returns:
boolean handler result. true - if the everything is OK otherwise is false
